I

index - Variable in class Game.Heart
the index of the heart
index - Variable in class Game.Player
the index of the player (received by the server)
initComponents() - Method in class Game.Main
Creates the components of the JFrame and adds them to the frame.
initFrame() - Method in class Game.Main
Handles the initialization of the JFrame: size, color, keyListener etc.
initSocketStreams() - Method in class Game.Player
initialize the client's sockets and I/O streams
inputStreamFromServer - Variable in class Game.Player
the client's input stream
isJumping - Variable in class Game.MoveableCharacter
This is a boolean regarding the current state of the MoveableCharacter:
isJumping is true when the MoveableCharacter is in the middle of a jump
isLookingRight - Variable in class Game.Sprite
A boolean determines the side the Sprite is looking at (in order to set the correct Sprite.currentRow)
isLookingRight() - Method in class Game.Sprite
 
isMovingRight - Variable in class Game.FireAttack
a boolean determining the direction of the movement of the FireAttack (according to the Sprite.isLookingRight() method)
isTouching(MoveableCharacter) - Method in class Game.MoveableCharacter
This method determines if the instance of the MoveableCharacter is touching the MoveableCharacter given as an argument
